@graph.caption: Vegan Double Chocolate Chip Cookies | Vegan Richa #glutenfree #veganricha #vegan

@graph.name: Vegan Double Chocolate Chip Cookies - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Easy Vegan Double Chocolate Chip cookies with Chickpea brine. No flax needed. great for Ice cream sandwiches. Vegan Palm oil free recipe.

@graph.name: Vegan Double Chocolate Chip Cookies
@graph.description: Easy Vegan Double Chocolate Chip cookies with Chickpea brine. No flax needed. great for Ice cream sandwiches. Vegan Palm oil free recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup ground raw sugar or powdered sugar
1/4 cup unbleached white flour  (or use more white whole wheat flour)
3.5 Tbsp cocoa powder (4 tbsp for darker)
1/8 tsp to 1/4 tsp salt (depending on if the brine was salted)
3 tbsp finely chopped dark  (or vegan semi sweet chocolate)
1/4 to 1/3 cup vegan semi sweet chocolate chips

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, combine oil, sugar, chickpea brine, vanilla extract and cinnamon until mixed well.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, combine oil, sugar, chickpea brine, vanilla extract and cinnamon until mixed well.

recipeInstructions.text: In another bowl, combine all the dry ingredients and finely chopped dark chocolate and mix well. Combine both the bowls and mix to form a soft sticky dough.
recipeInstructions.name: In another bowl, combine all the dry ingredients and finely chopped dark chocolate and mix well. Combine both the bowls and mix to form a soft sticky dough.

recipeInstructions.text: Add chocolate chips and mix well. Chill the dough for 15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add chocolate chips and mix well. Chill the dough for 15 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 350 degrees F / 180ºc.
recipeInstructions.name: Pre-heat the oven to 350 degrees F / 180ºc.

recipeInstructions.text: Take handful of the dough and shape into a flat ball. Place on parchment lined sheet and press to flatten. Shape the rest of the cookies.
recipeInstructions.name: Take handful of the dough and shape into a flat ball. Place on parchment lined sheet and press to flatten. Shape the rest of the cookies.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 11 to 12 minutes. Cool for 5 minutes then remove from the sheet. Serve or use to make ice cream sandwiches!
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 11 to 12 minutes. Cool for 5 minutes then remove from the sheet. Serve or use to make ice cream sandwiches!

recipeInstructions.text: To make this without chickpea brine, use 3 tbsp non dairy milk + 1 tbsp flax seed meal. Mix, let sit for a minute and use.
recipeInstructions.name: To make this without chickpea brine, use 3 tbsp non dairy milk + 1 tbsp flax seed meal. Mix, let sit for a minute and use.
